name: Polygon Mall
description:
Come to Polygon Mall; a place for all kinds of people to gather, shop, and walk around! Unfortunately, many folks tend to get lost here, so we've hired top-notch personnel to find these missing persons.

Help your clients find their lost ones in the sea of other shoppers, they could be anywhere! Search through the mall and ask other shoppers to see where they might've gone to.

Once they're found, it won't be an easy task to bring them back. As with any mall, there are many distractions and nuisances that you'll have to try and avoid.  (If they ever lose interest, giving them a gift wouldn't hurt to get them to follow you again.)

Work with your friends to help the shoppers of Polygon Mall!

Made for Back To School Multiplayer Game Jam
Very WIP, with a bit too many bugs for our programmer's liking.
*Important Note*

To start the day enter center of "reception desk" area, do not start the day until everyone has loaded in.

Credits:
